oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic Aquaculture - From Niche to growing Business
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Jokumsen, Alfred
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Denmark
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The experiments showed, that the substitutions of fish meal by the matrix of plant protein koncentrates (pea, horse bean and rape) did not have significant effekces on the growth of the trout as well as on fish health. Investigations of the product quality did show changes in taste as well as texture properties. The case studies provided important information about progress, but as well revealed new challenges for the organic culture of trout in Denmark.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Jokumsen, Alfred (2011) Organic Aquaculture - From Niche to growing Business. [Økologisk akvakultur - Fra Niche to vækst område.] ICROFSnews, 2011, Dec-11, . [Submitted]
